articles.title: Google Chrome users may need to update browser in security emergency - Leicestershire Live
articles.description: Users have been advised to install the update as soon as possible
articles.content:
Search engine Google has launched an emergency update for Chrome users worldwide amid a security scare.

articles.title: Say hello to Ford's 1400bhp electric Mustang - Top Gear
articles.description: The Cobra Jet 1400 Prototype should “crush” the ¼-mile in about eight seconds
articles.content: Back in 1968 Ford built 50 special lightweight Mustangs specifically for drag racing. Some 40 years later it revived the practice, and most years since has built small batches of these fat-tyred, turn-key but non road-legal Mustangs. Theyre called Cobra Jets,… [+1250 chars]

articles.description: BT, VIRGIN Media, Sky and many other broadband customers have just received some good news as it's revealed that UK download speeds are finally getting faster.
